author: cnbc.com
title: Cubic reports 1Q loss
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Cubic Corp. (CUB) on Tuesday reported a loss of $9.8 million in its fiscal first quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 36 cents. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs and restructuring costs, came to 1 cent per share.
The electronics company posted revenue of $340.7 million in the period.
Cubic expects full-year revenue in the range of $1.51 billion to $1.56 billion.
Cubic shares have dropped 5 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $56, a rise of 18 percent in the last 12 months.
